Title: New security options
Description: Your data are protected by a new algorithm. Also, you can define an application to ignore like password managers and banking apps.

Title: Multiple monitors and HDPI supported
Description: The paste bar now fit to any monitor size, screen resolution and screen scale.

Title: Smart search
Description: Accessing to your data is faster thanks to a smart search bar that allows to filter by data type.

Title: Inspired by Windows 10 for Windows 10
Description: A dark and touch friendly interface is now available. The paste bar can be displayed to the bottom of the screen. The integration to Windows 10 allows better performances and less memory consumption.

Title: Synchronization with OneDrive and DropBox
Description: More stable and faster synchronization, still with your personal Cloud storage account to keep the control on your data.

Title: iOS and Android
Description: Smartphone and tablet apps will be available soon and will offer the possibility to keep and retrieve what you copy on another device.
